fields_of_interest: Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: TLP focuses on the topics of posting of workers directive as well as "Road Initiatives" and Mobility Package
organisation_name: Związek Pracodawców Transport i Logistyka Polska (TLP)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Konfedercja Lewiatan (The Polish Confederation Lewiatan) directly and indirectly, by the Polish COnfederation Lewiatan - BusinessEurope.

goals__remit: Defending legitimate interests and rights of the employers in the transport sector, representation of the employers vis a vis trade unions, local administration and state authorities, expressing opinions and preparing initiatives on legal regulations concerning any aspects of the transport and social issues in the transport sector, working life, participation in national and international organisations (The Polish Confederation Lewiatan, BusinessEurope)
